thread.title: Blind chicken rescued from 'cage-free' farm recovers | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Blind chicken rescued from 'cage-free' farm recovers | Daily Mail Online

author: Brianne Tolj For Dailymail.Com
title: Blind chicken rescued from 'cage-free' farm recovers | Daily Mail Online
text: Skeletal and blind chicken Scarlett found cowering in fear under a pile of other birds at a factory farm learns to love life again after miraculous rescue A very ill chicken named 'Scarlett' has been rescued from a California farm Direct Action Everywhere activists spotted her at a 'Certified Humane' farm Scarlett was discovered crammed into a room with around 35,000 other birds She was spotted by activists because of its lack of feathers and poor health Scarlett has now recovered and gained her eyesight and shiny coat back WARNING: graphic content Published: 02:07 GMT, 13 February 2017 | Updated: 07:10 GMT, 13 February 2017 141 shares
